name: Groq Chat Model
natural_language_description: 这是 Groq Chat Model 节点。主要用于: Language Model Groq

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one

model.name: model
model.description: The model which will generate the completion. Learn more.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model which will generate the completion. Learn more. | 默认值: llama3-8b-8192

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: maxTokensToSample (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion
temperature (值: None) - Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.completion || upstream.text || upstream.content || upstream } }
